name: PROPOFOL
indications: Propofol injectable emulsion is an intravenous general anesthetic and sedation drug indicated for:
contraindications: See Full Prescribing Information for detailed dosing instructions. ( 2 )
warningsAndPrecautions:
Propofol Injectable Emulsion USP, 10 mg per mL is supplied as a sterile, white, homogeneous emulsion filled in clear glass vial.
                  It is available as follows:

                  Store between 4째 to 25째C (40째 to 77째F). Do not freeze. Shake well before use.
adverseReactions:
Propofol injectable emulsion is contraindicated in patients with a known hypersensitivity to propofol or any of propofol injectable emulsion components.
                  Propofol injectable emulsion is contraindicated in patients with a history of anaphylaxis to eggs, egg products, soybeans or soy products.
